description: A React functional component named 'Loading' that renders a loading indicator with customizable label, variant, and aria-live attributes. It includes inline CSS for a spinning animation and supports two display variants: 'inline' and 'card'.

methods.name: Loading({ label = 'Loading...', variant = 'card', 'aria-live': ariaLive = 'polite' })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a loading indicator with optional label, variant, and aria-live properties.

ctags.name: Loading
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Loading({ label = 'Loading...', variant = 'card', 'aria-live': ariaLive /
